body.name: Crucial P3 Plus 4TB PCIe Gen4 3D NAND NVMe M.2 SSD, up to 5000MB/s - CT4000P3PSSD8
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 8 hrs 6 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 16 hrs 6 mins
features: NVMe (PCIe Gen4 x4) technology with up to 5000MB/s sequential reads, random read/write 650K/900K IOPS
Performs up to 43% faster than the fastest Gen3 NVMe SSDs
Rated at MTTF greater than 1.5 million hours for extended longevity and reliability
body.description: Valuable Gen4 performance is here. Introducing the Crucial P3 Plus Gen4 NVMe SSD, delivering impressive speed with sequential reads/writes up to 5000/4200MB/s. Including dynamic write acceleration and adaptive thermal protection to keep your data safe while enhancing system reliability, the P3 Plus is the NVMe storage solution professionals, creatives, gamers, and other high-performance users need. Engineered by Micron with the latest Gen4 NVMe 3D NAND technology, the Crucial P3 Plus comes in generous capacities and offers flexible backward compatibility for most Gen3 systems.

1. Typical I/O performance numbers as measured using CrystalDiskMark with command queue full and write cache enabled. Fresh out-of-box (FOB) state is assumed. For performance measurement purposes, the SSD may be restored to FOB state using the secure erase command. System variations will affect measured results. 2. Some of the storage capacity is used for formatting and other purposes and is not available for data storage. 1GB equals 1 billion bytes. Not all capacities available at initial launch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast read/write but no heatsink
reviews.reviewText: This memory is very fast. Put it in a PS5. Copied 560 gb from internal memory to this memory in 3.5 minutes. But PlayStation is very clear that you must use memory with a heatsink to protect it. Not a huge deal since you can buy one on Amazon to attach to this memory for about $7.It was easy to install, works great and was the best price. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 TB ssd NVMe 2280
reviews.reviewText: Drive was easy to install on my new MSI Z790 motherboard and is extremely fast. Will probably use the drive for games and other high data demands. Crucial makes great memory and drives so unit should last for a long time. Price was great for this capacity of ssd!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast and backwards compatible
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to add more space to my Zephyrus G15. I immediately moved my games over to it to stress test it. I have had no issues with performance, heat or lock ups of any kind thus far. Great price for a Gen 4 of this size and works on my Gen 3 bus with no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It am what it be
reviews.reviewText: Plug it in and go. Plenty of storage, fast and functional. Very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FAST, GREAT PRICE, PERFECT FOR EDITING AND GAMING!
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect for me since I needed more space rather than using an external. Knowing I have enough space to record my videos and edit, along with install my games is amazing. This M.2 Gen 4 worked perfect out of the box. All I had to do was plug in, boot up, and create my partition in windows disk manager. That's it! Make sure to go to the crucial site and update the firmware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Needs to be initialized before use with Dell computers
reviews.reviewText: This drive works great and is amazing for the price but be warned that you can't do a fresh install of Windows 10 on it without initializing the drive first. I bought this for a Dell Latitude 7490 as an upgrade and I tried to install Windows 10 from USB and the computer would just keep boot looping never getting past the Dell logo. This was never an issue with other drives like Samsung so I found it odd and in my research I found out this is a common issue with this drive on Dell computers. So I had to put the drive into an enclosure and plug it into another computer to format it and initialize it before it worked. From there a fresh install of Windows 10 could be done. Maybe it's Crucial's specific firmware but I've never had this happen with other brands of drives. Would be a 5 star rating otherwise since it works great and is crazy fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast and plenty of storage
reviews.reviewText: There are something like 10,000 reviews on this Crucial P3 Plus 4TB PCIe Gen4 3D NAND NVMe M.2 SSD, so I doubt I have too much to add. After reviewing a seemingly innumerable number of reviews on this m.2 and other drives, it seemed that this was the best value for the money.My desktop has a number of older (like 10 years old) platter hard drives and I wanted to surplus them and increase speed at the same time. This device boasts 4tb of data and will handle my primary needs, allowing the HDD drives to act as backups. I didn't make this drive the boot drive as I intended it for storage, but I am reconsidering that (although the boot drive is a Samsung EVO SSD). Not sure which I'll do.Overall, after a couple of months, I'm very happy with this drive. The Black Friday sale of less than $200 out the door was a bonus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install. Much faster than the old ribbon attached drives.
Funcionando perfeitamente, deu um ganho de velocidade para meu notebook, clonei o sd anterior.. talvez ficaria mais rápido se fosse feita uma formatação

Comprei o NVME para colocar os jogos mais pesados que tenho e estão abrindo super rápidos, como também a gameplay melhorou bastante neles, principalmente no Cyberpunk 2077. Fácil de instalar, assim como qualquer outro NVME.Quanto ao reconhecimento, tive que instalar o driver fornecido pela Crucial para o Windows enxergar corretamente, acredito que se dá pelo fato dele ser Gen 4 e minha placa-mãe ainda ser Gen 3.Após isso, foi só entrar no gerenciamento de disco do windows e alocar o espaço, que vem não alocado como padrão.A entrega foi feita certinha, sem problemas. Produto bem embalado também.

I have acquired the remarkable SSD, and I must express my sheer elation with its astounding performance. This petite dynamo has catapulted my computer's velocity to unprecedented levels! With its remarkable swiftness in reading and writing, my applications materialize instantaneously, while file transfers flow seamlessly.This SSD not only delivers unparalleled rapidity but also exudes extraordinary dependability. Having employed it for numerous months, it has exhibited unwavering consistency. Its robust construction instills unwavering assurance, safeguarding my precious data.The installation process proved to be a breeze, courtesy of its M.2 form factor, flawlessly harmonizing with my system. Moreover, its compact design optimizes space utilization in my setup, making it all the more impressive.Should you seek to enhance your computer's capabilities through an SSD upgrade, the M.2 SSD is the epitome of a sound investment. Brace yourself for a performance enhancement like no other. I assure you, disappointment will not be a part of your experience!
Reçu rapidement mais le carton ne contenait que la... documentation...

reviews.reviewTitle: Performances exceptionnelles à un prix abordable
reviews.reviewText: J'ai récemment acheté ce SSD NVMe Crucial et je suis extrêmement satisfait de mon achat. Ce SSD offre des performances exceptionnelles à un prix abordable, ce qui en fait un choix idéal pour les utilisateurs à la recherche d'une mise à niveau de stockage rapide et fiable.L'installation du SSD était simple et rapide grâce à son format M.2. Une fois installé, j'ai été époustouflé par les vitesses de lecture et d'écriture élevées du SSD. Les temps de chargement sont considérablement réduits, que ce soit pour le démarrage du système d'exploitation, le chargement des applications ou le transfert de fichiers volumineux.De plus, la fiabilité du SSD Crucial est un autre aspect qui m'a impressionné. J'ai utilisé ce disque pendant plusieurs semaines maintenant et je n'ai rencontré aucun problème. Il fonctionne toujours de manière fluide et stable, sans aucune perte de performances.En ce qui concerne le rapport qualité-prix, ce SSD Crucial offre un excellent choix. Il rivalise facilement avec des modèles plus chers tout en restant abordable. Pour les utilisateurs à la recherche d'un SSD performant sans avoir à dépenser une fortune, je le recommande vivement.En résumé, le SSD NVMe Crucial est un choix fantastique si vous recherchez des performances élevées à un prix raisonnable. Son installation facile, ses vitesses de lecture/écriture rapides et sa fiabilité en font un achat sûr. Je suis extrêmement satisfait de mon achat et je le recommande à tous ceux qui cherchent à améliorer les performances de leur système de stockage.
